title: The BIGGEST Gift Under the TREE
body_text:
Please enjoy the music!
Christmas Special Main Event
JOHN TRONOLONE vs. TOM ADAMS
It's indeed a time to give a little something back - how's about this gigantic main event!
Uncanny power, incomparable agility, over-inflated egos - they've got it all. Two of the baddest from dodgeball's hayday collide for the very first time in their illustrious careers. There isn't any doubt that this contest will rank right up there with some of the memorable clashes of the past year.
The closest of allies or a long-running hatred? The
JOHN vs. TOM: Historical Perpective
explains.
JOHN vs. TOM: A Historical Perpective
DODGEBALL 9 (10.22.05)
Tension was in the air, especially following the brutal, Tronolone-given nutshot.
DODGEBALL 29 (3.4.06)
As a surviving unite, the "egos of destruction" go on a ten-men tear.
DODGEBALL XXX-SEVEN (4.28.06)
"Thank god that wasn't me", proclaimed the third eldest Adams, referring to Tronolone's numbing nutshot on the ever-intense Ryan McCrorey. Twenty short minutes later, Tom suffers the same fate.
DODGEBALL 108 (10.20.07)
Tom unloads with a barrage of amo, impactfully connecting with Tronolone's face, busting "The Creation's" lip wide open. The effect of this massacre set the stage for their forthcoming encounter.
And who could possibly forget about the Nogueira sisters! That's right, these two supposed "Gods" dated the beautiful Elizabeth and Kathryn. My how times have changed!
.....
The ultimate grudge match,
JOHN vs. TOM
, and it can only happen at the second annual Christmas Spectacular, DODGEBALL ONE-SEVENTEEN, on December 22.
And there's plenty more in store for this 117th extravaganza. Check back on Friday!
body_html:
Please enjoy the music!

Christmas Special Main Event
JOHN TRONOLONE vs. TOM ADAMS
It's indeed a time to give a little something back - how's about this gigantic main event!

Uncanny power, incomparable agility, over-inflated egos - they've got it all. Two of the baddest from dodgeball's hayday collide for the very first time in their illustrious careers. There isn't any doubt that this contest will rank right up there with some of the memorable clashes of the past year.

The closest of allies or a long-running hatred? The JOHN vs. TOM: Historical Perpective explains.

JOHN vs. TOM: A Historical Perpective

DODGEBALL 9 (10.22.05)
Tension was in the air, especially following the brutal, Tronolone-given nutshot.

DODGEBALL 29 (3.4.06)
As a surviving unite, the "egos of destruction" go on a ten-men tear.

DODGEBALL XXX-SEVEN (4.28.06)
"Thank god that wasn't me", proclaimed the third eldest Adams, referring to Tronolone's numbing nutshot on the ever-intense Ryan McCrorey. Twenty short minutes later, Tom suffers the same fate.

DODGEBALL 108 (10.20.07)
Tom unloads with a barrage of amo, impactfully connecting with Tronolone's face, busting "The Creation's" lip wide open. The effect of this massacre set the stage for their forthcoming encounter.

And who could possibly forget about the Nogueira sisters! That's right, these two supposed "Gods" dated the beautiful Elizabeth and Kathryn. My how times have changed!

.....

The ultimate grudge match, JOHN vs. TOM, and it can only happen at the second annual Christmas Spectacular, DODGEBALL ONE-SEVENTEEN, on December 22.

And there's plenty more in store for this 117th extravaganza. Check back on Friday!
